Name: Whisky Fizz
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Soda from siphon
Instructions: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.
Review: The character of the whisky shines through this refreshing, balanced, sweet and sour drink.
Nutrition: One serving of Whisky Fizz contains 186 calories
